title: Individual Teacher/School Letters on Roommate's Poster
content:
My roommate got this poster, I assume those are some school-type-teacher-bought letters. Not sure though how I can emulate them as a Font tho.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Death is Wack](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011164042/http:/typophile.com/files/20130630_025747.jpg) | 1.42 MB |
author: adjectivenoun

comments.content: Oh wait. I think it's Vag Rounded. Sorry to waste the time. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011164042/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/vag-rounded/")
